aka: I'm the Angel of Death: Pusher III
Pusher 3: I'm the Angel of Death

cast.name: 兹拉特科·布里奇 Zlatko Buric

writer.name: 尼古拉斯·温丁·雷弗恩 Nicolas Winding Refn

director.name: 尼古拉斯·温丁·雷弗恩 Nicolas Winding Refn

trans_title: I'm the Angel of Death: Pusher III
Pusher 3: I'm the Angel of Death
introduction: In this third installment of the 'Pusher' trilogy, we follow Milo (Zlatko Buric), the drug lord from the two first films. He is aging, he is planning his daughter's 25th birthday and his shipment of heroin turns out to be 10.000 pills of ecstasy. When Milo tries to sell the pills anyway, all Hell breaks loose. (Slavko Labovic).- Written by larsthebellhop@ofir,dk
